Reviews.Title: “Good hotel with an easily accessible location (by car)”

Reviews.Content: enjoyed nice stay hotel pleasant staff helpful located 10 minute drive cbd prepared car advised bus front door running regularly city free parking included didnt opt breakfast included cant comment restaurant looked nice catering wedding evenings stayed including loud noise music nice restaurant surprised wasnt fitness centre site nearby star rated hotel disappointed swimming pool wasnt despite consistent 30 degree plus weather daily weeks reasons booked check advised pool wasnt 23 weeks clean bed extremely comfortable noise fine apart wedding night private secluded despite hotel staff friendly including helping reverse charges call overseas lovely helpful giving directions map etc internet connection free wifi access reception unlike stays stay preferring stay little town recommend hotel otherwise stay cbd

Reviews.Content: hotel suburban seemingly residential green airy despite construction roads etc local shopsbars etc frequent 1015 minute bus ride nearest metro station student stay arriving madrid car holiday season office function invasion quiet hard atmosphere restaurant holiday season friendly helpful staff
